Text.Page:
I trust you, , and I think the loyal faeries will trust you, too.

Go to the Faerie Pond and tell them they're safe—for the time being.

We hoped Lillix would be able to talk some sense into the people of Lumbertown—not to mention our blood-mad brethren.

If you're trying to keep the peace here, , you're a friend of ours.

You may say we're safe, but I'll never feel safe until I know what caused all my brethren to turn so...so violent.

Faeries rarely turn against faeries...unless they're forced to. If you claim it wasn't the federation's fault, then the answers must lie elsewhere.
